name: code-analyzer
description: Full-stack application for extracting and analyzing code from images using OCR and LLM

scripts.install-all: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.start: npm run start-backend & npm run start-frontend
scripts.start-with-tunnels: npm run start-backend-tunnel & npm run start-frontend-tunnel
scripts.test: npm run test-backend && npm run test-frontend
